sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnqainfo ( qa_id , qestn_sj , qestn_cn , writng_de , rdcnt , email_adres , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , qna_process_sttus_code , wrter_nm , answer_cn , writng_password , answer_de , email_answer_at , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno ) VALUES ( #qaId# , #qestnSj# , #qestnCn# , #writngDe# , #rdcnt# , #emailAdres# , SYSDATE() , #frstRegisterId# , #qnaProcessSttusCode# , #wrterNm# , #answerCn# , #writngPassword# , #answerDe# , #emailAnswerAt# , #areaNo# , #middleTelno# , #endTelno# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnqainfo SET qa_id = #qaId# , qestn_sj = #qestnSj# , qestn_cn = #qestnCn# , writng_de = #writngDe# , rdcnt = #rdcnt# , email_adres = #emailAdres# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , qna_process_sttus_code = #qnaProcessSttusCode# , wrter_nm = #wrterNm# , answer_cn = #answerCn# , writng_password = #writngPassword# , answer_de = #answerDe# , email_answer_at = #emailAnswerAt# , area_no = #areaNo# , middle_telno = #middleTelno# , end_telno = #endTelno# WHERE 1 = 1 AND qa_id = #qaId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnqainfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND qa_id = #qaId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT qa_id , qestn_sj , qestn_cn , writng_de , rdcnt , email_adres , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , qna_process_sttus_code , wrter_nm , answer_cn , writng_password , answer_de , email_answer_at , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno FROM comtnqainfo WHERE qa_id = #qaId#

SELECT qa_id , qestn_sj , qestn_cn , writng_de , rdcnt , email_adres , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , qna_process_sttus_code , wrter_nm , answer_cn , writng_password , answer_de , email_answer_at , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno FROM comtnqainfo WHERE 1=1
qa_id = #searchKeyword#
qestn_sj LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY qa_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnqainfo WHERE 1=1
qa_id = #searchKeyword#
qestn_sj LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
